carmen_navigator_set_goal_message Struct Reference
[The Navigator Module (navigator)]

#include <navigator_messages.h>


Data Fields

double x
double y
double timestamp
char * host

Detailed Description

This message is sent to the navigator by other programs wishing to plan and move towards an (x,y) position.

Definition at line 99 of file navigator_messages.h.

Field Documentation

double carmen_navigator_set_goal_message::y
 

It is assumed that (x, y) is in the reference frame of the current map.
